Text:
to any viruses?
No viruses! Clean!
how to change clan tag and avatar?

to nass3k
Clan tag: "Start" - "All Programs" - "Strogino CS Portal" - "Counter-Strike Source" - "ClanName Change".
Avatar: your avatar in no-steam client may see only you.
It wont let me change my name. when i type set name and than the name i want to use it says "setname" not valid command

to Vizardgear
Then run UltimateNameChanger.exe in game dir and change your name.
Can you walk me through how to get UltimateNameChanger and how to use it? please

to Vizardgear
If you use my game-build this tool placed in game dir.
"ProcName value not found on commandline or in rev.ini.Please edit the file"

to tinho155

If you are updating from previous CS:S version, you must add to rev.ini (placed in game dir) strings:

[Loader]
ProcName = hl2.exe -steam -game cstrike -appid 240 -novid

And replace this string:

SteamDll = ./bin/Steam/Steam.dll

To this:

SteamDll = ./Steam/Steam.dll

Then turn off antivirus and run updater. Enjoy.
